Actions.Name: Full Auto
Actions.Description: While in this stance, the this character is immobile, but gains the following benefits:

ListedItems.Description: All their attacks gain +1 boon, deal bonus damage, and deal 2 piercing damage to all foes in range 2 of their target as an area effect.
Their abilities have no maximum range.
They can only exit this stance by spending 1 action and ending their turn.

Actions.Name: Collateral Damage
Actions.Description: The [name] blasts a character in range with a hail of bullets, dealing 2 piercing damage to them, then creates a medium blast area effect on the other side of that character. Characters in the area take 2 piercing damage, once, per character caught in the area.
